title: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work. Description:Color orange doesn't work.Steps to reproduce:1. Insert a report item.2. Set the color or background color to orange.3. Verify that the color remains the same or changes to a different color.
OB: When setting the color or background color of a report item to orange, the color does not change.
EB: When setting the color or background color of a report item to orange, the color should change to a shade of orange.
SR:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.
3. Verify that the color changes to a shade of orange.
